message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $110. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $90 is just a little too low for me. How about $95? It's a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $85?
